remarks: Left operation by a constant on a mixed operation with a constant. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2017.)
statement:
ofcc.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ofcc.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
ofcc.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
ofcc $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A X. { B } ) oFC R C ) = ( A X. { ( B R C ) } ) ) $.
